summary: Provides algorithms for synthesizing quantum circuits that realize linear reversible and phase transformations under linear nearest‑neighbor constraints. Includes methods for low‑CNOT CNOT‑Phase synthesis, depth‑optimized CZ‑CX construction, and bounded‑depth CZ‑only circuits, all returning Qiskit QuantumCircuit objects.
business_intent: Allow quantum software developers to automatically generate compact, low‑depth circuits for linear‑phase operations and linear‑nearest‑neighbor hardware, improving performance and feasibility of quantum algorithms on constrained devices.
